name: Ensure All Materials are checked as per approved drawings
Ensure Suface Cleanliness & MEP clearance check
Check External Wall Lining Installation as per approved shop drawings and manufacturer specification
Ensure External Wall Linings joints treated with approved Sealant
External Buildwrap/Breather Membrane installation Check as per approved drawing & manufacturer specification
Application of flasing tape as per approved drawing & manufacturer specification in heads, sill & jambs of Windows/Sliding Doors
Check & Ensure all MEP Service Penetrations on Buildwrap/ Breather membrane is treated as per manufacturer specification
